name: seekr
description: Your Personal Career Autopilot - Multi-platform career management system

scripts.start:web: npx kill-port 4100 && cd web && npm run dev -- --port 4100
scripts.build:all: npm run build:web && npm run build:desktop && npm run build:mobile && npm run build:extension
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../desktop && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../extension && npm install
scripts.type-check:all: cd web && npm run type-check && cd ../desktop && npm run type-check && cd ../mobile && npm run type-check && cd ../extension && npm run type-check
